function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Cooperation and interaction in residential balconies can lead to the spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to close contact and interaction in shared spaces.","Mitigation":"Implement regulations for social distancing and crowd control in shared balcony spaces.","Technologies":"Surveillance cameras for monitoring crowd density and contact tracing apps for identifying potential disease spread.","People":"Residents of buildings with shared balconies.","Owner":"Building management or local authorities."},{"Description":"Aesthetic use of balconies can lead to overcrowding and close proximity, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Higher risk of disease transmission due to overcrowding and close contact in shared balcony spaces.","Mitigation":"Limit the number of people allowed on balconies at any given time and enforce social distancing measures.","Technologies":"Access control systems to restrict the number of individuals on the balcony and AI-powered crowd monitoring for compliance with social distancing rules.","People":"Residents and visitors using balconies for aesthetic purposes.","Owner":"Building management or property owners."}]}
